question: The recently launched LADIS portal is most closely associated to__?
explanation: The Inland Waterways Authority of India (IWAI) has launched a new portal called LADIS or Least Available Depth Information System in Delhi on 15th February 2019. LADIS will enable real-time data on least available depths to be disseminated for ship/barge and cargo owners so that they can undertake transportation on National Waterways (NWs) in a more planned way.
